snippet: Brad Davis had a goal and an assist, and the Houston Dynamo set an Major League Soccer record for longest home unbeaten streak in all competitions with a victory over the Chicago Fire.
abstract: Houston Dynamo sets Major League Soccer record for longest home unbeaten streak in all competitions with 2-1 victory over Chicago Fire; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Brad Davis had a goal and an assist, and the Houston Dynamo set an Major League Soccer record for longest home unbeaten streak in all competitions with a victory over the Chicago Fire.

headline.seo: Dynamo Set Record for Longest Home Unbeaten Streak
headline.main: Dynamo Set Record for Longest Home Unbeaten Streak
